channel.title: Software Architecture on Mircea Lungu
channel.description: Recent content in Software Architecture on Mircea Lungu

item.title: üìù Evolutionary and Collaborative Software Architecture Recovery
item.description: Our work on Softwarenaut has finally been published in the Science of Computer Programming. The paper (pdf, bibtex,citations) introduces Softwarenaut, a visual, interactive architecture recovery tool which leverages evolutionary analysis to support source code understanding. This page contains a very high level description of the tool. For details and case studies, see the journal article that describes the tool (preprint pdf, bibtex) the conference paper that describes the way we visualized hierarchical clusterings of software systems (preprint pdf, bibtex)
